about_the_game:
Porndle is a variation of pWordle (or Picture Wordle). It is an highly addictive and challenging word puzzle game, available in multiple languages. Inspired by the hit game WORDLE, with its innovative new features, the basic Porndle version offers a more anime ecchi style picture gallery.

Image Gallery:

Porndle features a browsable image gallery where players can view the images they have unlocked. With fullscreen, zooming, panning, players can enjoy their images in detail or set the automatic slideshow feature and enjoy their gallery.

Language Support:

Porndle supports multiple languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and more. This means that players can experience the game in their native language and improve their vocabulary skills at the same time.

Virtual Keyboard:

To make it easier for players to enter words with a single hand, Porndle includes a virtual keyboard for each supported language. This makes it quick and simple to enter words, and eliminates the need for a physical keyboard.

Word of the Day:

The Word of the Day feature offers daily challenges for players to solve. With this feature, players can improve their vocabulary skills and learn new words every day.

Freeplay Mode:

Once the Word of the Day has been played, players can enjoy unlimited play in the freeplay mode. This mode offers endless opportunities for players to hone their vocabulary skills and unlock more images in their gallery.

Steam Achievements:

Porndle includes Steam achievements for players to unlock as they progress through the game. These achievements offer a sense of accomplishment and provide a reason for players to keep coming back to the game.

Player Stats:

Porndle tracks player stats for both the Word of the Day and Freeplay modes. Players can view their stats to see how they are improving over time and compare their scores with others.

Jukebox:

Porndle allows players to customize their gaming experience with the Jukebox feature. Players can choose which songs are played by toggling them on or off in the options. With the ability to create a personalized playlist, players can enjoy their favorite tunes while they play.

Summary:

Porndle is a more sexy version of the word puzzle game with beautiful provocative pictures to unlock. Improving on the original hit game WORDLE with many new innovative features, including language support, virtual keyboard, Word of the Day, freeplay mode, image gallery, Steam achievements, player stats, and jukebox, Porndle offers endless hours of entertainment and the opportunity to improve vocabulary skills. Get ready to put your vocabulary to the test with Porndle!

content_descriptors.notes:
Please be aware that this game is a word puzzle game which lets the player unlocks sexually suggestive imagery. The images in the base game have a sexualized or 'ecchi' nature and feature characters in suggestive positions, often wearing revealing clothing. While no explicit nudity (i.e., no depiction of genitals or nipples) is shown, the content may not be appropriate for all players.

It is important to note that all characters shown in this game are fictitious and do not represent anyone in real life. Additionally, all characters depicted are over the age of 21.

name: Porndle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: No requirements
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Porndle is a fun and sexy version of the word puzzle game inspired by the popular game Wordle and is available in multiple languages. With a virtual keyboard, Daily Word, Freeplay mode, jukebox and gallery, players can unlock beautiful images and earn achievements while improving their vocabulary.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech*, Dutch*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Danish*, Finnish*, Greek*, Norwegian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Ukrainian*, Indonesian*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
